channel.title: Quick question about Merc
channel.description:
If you are a merc, and your target dies, it says you have "three days" to find a new target. What, exactly, does that mean?
If your target is executed on day 2, will you commit suicide at the start of day 5, start of night 5, or start of day 6?
If your target is killed on night 4, when will you commit suicide?

item.title: Quick question about Merc
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
You kill yourself at night, not middle of day

item.title: Quick question about Merc
item.dc:creator: Wolfy
item.description:
I think the wording needs to be changed. Merc’s don’t have a target. They have a contract. A bit of a contradiction of a target and a contract if you ask me, especially when it says you have to find a new contract.

Unless it’s people that are thinking target?
